subject: Soccer
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Mike Grella scored seven seconds into the game — the fastest goal in M.L.S. history — and the host Red Bulls beat the Philadelphia Union, 4-1, to clinch the top seed in the Eastern Conference playoffs.
snippet: Mike Grella scored seven seconds into the game — the fastest goal in M.L.S. history — and the host Red Bulls beat the Philadelphia Union, 4-1, to clinch the top seed in the Eastern Conference playoffs.
